ygData.subject: Re: So anyone wanna trade...
ygData.msgSnippet: ACK! Thanks for the info.....had no idea the drums were so cheap......hmm, maybe a drum/armor trade for the robes would be wiser. Thanks again Dank McGillicuty
ygData.messageBody:
ACK! Thanks for the info.....had no idea the drums were so cheap......hmm,
maybe a drum/armor trade for the robes would be wiser.

Thanks again

Dank McGillicuty

----- Original Message -----
From: Benoit St-Hilaire <bsthilai@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 15, 1999 11:42 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] So anyone wanna trade...


> From: Benoit St-Hilaire <bsthilai@...>
>
> Kyle Q wrote:
>
> > Would a Robe of the Oracle be a decent trade for a pair of MM Battle
drums?
> > Also anyone on Bristlebane interested in a trade like this? =)
> >
> > Dank McGillicuty
>
> I think the robe would be too mutch...
>
> The robe go for 1000-1500pp
> The Drum go for 250-500pp
>
> Up to you to make the trade...
>
> --
> Benoit St-Hilaire
> bsthilai@...
>
> "New York's such a wonderful city, but at the library the guy was very
rude. I said I'd like a card. He
> said, 'You have to prove you're a citizen of New York.' So I stabbed him."
> -- Emo Philips
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
